unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at XYZ Corp regularly visit IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Dr. Sharma's team focuses on candidates with strong analytical skills. Packages start at Rs. 7 lakhs per annum. The new Bangalore office offers 2000 sq ft of collaborative space. We also provide relocation assistance and a joining bonus. Screening rounds include aptitude tests and group discussions mirroring typical IT company recruitment in India. This year's drive starts Nov 15th.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at X Y Z Corp regularly visit I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Doctor Sharma's team focuses on candidates with strong analytical skills. Packages start at rupee seven lakhs per annum. The new Bangalore office offers two thousand square feet of collaborative space. We also provide relocation assistance and a joining bonus.
